dict.acceptation: 敌人的；敌方的；与敌对力量相关的；

sent.orig: Impertinent analogy: Enemy retreat into me, enemy exhausted am hit, enemy battle my resting.
sent.trans: 不恰当的比喻：敌进我退，敌疲我打，敌战我休。

sent.orig: Atttack the enemy actively from the front, be inferior to assaulting from flank enemy weak point.
sent.trans: 从正面主动攻击敌人，不如从侧面攻打敌人薄弱环节。

sent.orig: The enemy killed one of our comrades and we killed an enemy agent.
sent.trans: 敌人杀了我们一个同志，我们宰了一个敌特。

sent.orig: We should support whatever the enemy opposes and oppose whatever the enemy supports.
sent.trans: 凡是敌人反对的，我们就要拥护；凡是敌人拥护的，我们就要反对。

sent.orig: The enemy swarmed the hills, with 500 army bayonet enemy and started handhand.
sent.trans: 敌人涌上山头后，我军以500个刺刀与敌展开肉搏。
